title: Designing Virtual Reality-Based Mathematics Pedagogy: A Systems Thinking Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of secondary-level math fundamentals and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Establishing VR-based mathematics education environments for adult learners and applying systems-thinking pedagogy.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain three-dimensional geometry concepts in VR environments.
Learners design mathematical problem-solving strategies using a systems thinking approach
Learners develop and apply evaluation criteria for VR-based educational tools
Learners plan mathematics education scenarios utilizing digital literacy competencies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
